thread.title: CSL completes Novartis flu vaccine deal
thread.title_full: CSL completes Novartis flu vaccine deal

title: CSL completes Novartis flu vaccine deal
text:
Mon, Aug 3, 2015, 11:51 AM AEST - Australia Markets close in 4 hrs 9 mins CSL completes Novartis flu vaccine deal AAP – 2 hours 4 minutes ago Recommend 

Biotechnology giant CSL has completed its $US275 million ($A376.1 million) acquisition of Novartis' influenza business. 
CSL on Monday said it had paid cash for an acquisition that will allow it to create the world's second biggest company in the $US4 billion flu vaccine industry. 
The company's shares soared to a new all-time high of $98.96 on Friday, when the company said it was bringing forward the close date on the deal which was first announced last October. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Don't panic, $1m in super not essential AAP 
It would be nice to have $1 million in your superannuation account when you retire, but it's by no way essential. … Terms
